subanswer.text: Solo needs to read 405027 * 4 = 1607175 pages from his Geography textbook to complete his reading. Therefore, it takes 1607175 pages to complete his reading.

direct_answer.text: Let's think step by step. On average, Solo needs to read 1607175 pages from his Geography textbook. If Solo reads 405027 pages per day (7 days/week x 3 weeks/month x 4 months/year), he will complete reading all of his Geography textbook in 4 years. Therefore, the answer is: 4.
